body: Proof of identity can be confirmed by providing a copy of the front page of your last wage slip (which must be dated within the last three months), or emailing us from your government email address.

items.hint: Guidance for how to do this will be given to you on form completion
items.label: By sending an email from my government email address
By uploading a copy of my wage slip

components.legend: How would you like to prove your identity?
components.name: auto_name__41

heading: Proof of identity
